actions.text: Amendment SA 4369 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 32. Record Vote Number: 90.

Amendment SA 4369 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S3503-3504; text: CR S3503-3504) To provide that certain provisions in this Act relating to limitations, transparency, and oversight regarding medical research conducted by the Department of Defense shall have no force or effect.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4369 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 32. Record Vote Number: 90.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4369 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 32. Record Vote Number: 90.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4369 proposed by Senator Durbin.

purpose: To provide that certain provisions in this Act relating to limitations, transparency, and oversight regarding medical research conducted by the Department of Defense shall have no force or effect.
